Parameters: ByteBuffer: the ByteBuffer to update the checksum with
update(java.nio.ByteBuffer).Description: Updates the checksum with the bytes from the specified buffer. The checksum is updated using buffer.@B_java#nio#Buffer#remaining_E@ bytes starting at buffer.@B_java#nio#Buffer#position_E@ Upon return, the buffer's position will be updated to its limit; its limit will not have been changed.

Parameters: int: the byte to update the checksum with
update(int).Description: Updates the CRC-32 checksum with the specified byte (the low eight bits of the argument b).

Parameters: byte: the byte array to update the checksum with
int: the start offset of the data
int: the number of bytes to use for the update
Throws: if off is negative, or len is negative, or off+len is greater than the length of the array b
update(byte[], int, int).Description: Updates the CRC-32 checksum with the specified array of bytes.
update(byte[], int, int).FullName: public void update (byte[] b, int off, int len)

Parameters: byte: the array of bytes to update the checksum with
update(byte[]).Description: Updates the CRC-32 checksum with the specified array of bytes.

ClassDesc: A class that can be used to compute the CRC-32 of a data stream. Passing a null argument to a method in this class will cause a @B_java#lang#NullPointerException_E@ to be thrown.
